title: 328 DeKalb St --/-- Heat Incl. Updated 2BR Apt with Garage!
description:
Welcome to this awesome updated apartment in Norristown, PA! You won't have to worry about heating bills because it's included in the rent. Plus, it comes with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and a garage - perfect for anyone looking for some extra storage space.
Inside, you'll find an open kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plenty of closet space, and even a washer and dryer. This building is located in a convenient spot close to dining, shopping, and entertainment.
Just keep in mind that tenants are responsible for paying their own electricity bills, and there's a $30 application fee per adult. The security deposit is equal to one month's rent, and there's no smoking or pets allowed. The rent is only $725/month.

title: Green Community Living: Norristown Apartment Homes! --//1301 Powell St
description:
Check out this apartment community located at 1301 Powell St in Norristown, PA. It's got plenty of green space for you to enjoy, with nearby playgrounds and parks to explore. And when the weather is nice, you can picnic on the grass or just relax on your covered front stoop.
Inside, the units are well-designed with spacious kitchens, lots of natural light, and plenty of storage options. Plus, there are on-site laundry facilities that are super convenient.
Best of all, this community is close to shopping, dining, and entertainment, so you'll never be bored. And the best part? The rent is only $715 per month! So why not check it out and make it your new home?

title: 2br - 2 bedroom, 2 bath home in Harrisburg's east side!!
description: This wonderful brick 2 bedroom, 2 bath home features a basement and a large backyard and can be found on Evansville's east side. The large living room welcomes you with beautiful wood flooring. The dining area also includes wood flooring and an eye-catching focal wall with wood beams and industrial iron rods that are perfect for hanging artwork. The kitchen includes new tile flooring, beautiful white cabinets, a black backsplash and a gas stove. The full basement offers a good sized finished room with a fireplace and could be used as a recreation or family room. An additional finished room in the basement could be a home office or a 3rd bedroom, but it does not have a closet. Other amenities include a nice front porch, a 2 car garage and a deep yard at 231 feet. If you really like it and interested to rent please reply with your number.

title: Large One Master Bedroom En Suite Condo W/Parking
description:
Spacious bi-level 1 bedroom, 1.5 bath, 1,166 sqft, third floor condo unit located in a restored brownstone in a prime Art Museum/Francisville location! Enter into a wide open living room, dining room, kitchen with tile wood style floors, two front south facing windows with a glimpse of Center City, a cozy gas burning fireplace, ceiling fan, coat closet, and half bath. The kitchen features tile floor, granite countertops, cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances, garbage disposal, bar counter, and a window. Straight wood steps lead up to a fantastic master bedroom with two front windows, ceiling fan, and a large walk-in closet with a washer and dryer. Off the bedroom is a large master bath featuring a whirlpool tub, stall shower, and tiling throughout. This condo also includes a storage closet in the hallway outside of the unit, and a common basement great for bike storage.
I am a 44 y/o professional man currently separating from my wife. I am the VP of a local automation distributor and have been employed there 18 years. I’m looking for a clean tenant to rent this unit temporarily as I am back to DE for work. So at this point, I would like to go month to month indefinitely.
Erin

description:
If you're looking for a great place to live in Norristown, PA, check out this amazing single bedroom apartment at 1437 DeKalb St STE 100! It's been completely remodeled and is in immaculate condition - a real eye-popper!

title: Convenient 1BR Apt: Pet-Friendly, Efficient Living!-1001 Sterigere St
description:
Welcome to these awesome apartments located at 1001 Sterigere St, Norristown, PA. They're conveniently located and have some pretty sweet amenities.
To qualify, you'll need to have 2.5 times the rent in verifiable income, and either a $500 security deposit or one month's rent depending on your credit approval rating. You'll be responsible for paying for electric, cable/wifi, and heat, which is $45 for a 1 bedroom and approximately $23 a month for garbage. But don't worry, water and sewer are included in the rent!
The deposit amount varies based on your credit, but it starts at $500. The lease terms are flexible, ranging from 6 to 12 months.
If you have pets, you're in luck! We accept cats and dogs, with a maximum of two pets. Breed restrictions do apply, though.
As for apartment amenities, you'll have access to a dishwasher, energy-efficient appliances, large closets, and walk-in closets in select units. Some units even have a pantry!
The community features are pretty awesome too. We accept credit card and electronic payments, and we have emergency maintenance available. There are laundry facilities on-site, and we offer online services to make your life easier. The community is also pet-friendly, and we have a virtual community where you can connect with your neighbors.
Overall, these apartments have a lot to offer, so if you're looking for a new place to call home, this might be the perfect fit for you!

title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. Plus, access to major highways, public transportation, and Center City is easy. Want to see this in person? Schedule your showing today!

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

title: 2 Bed, 2.5 Bath, Tri-level Condo is Available for Rent in Fishtown!!
description:
Welcome to 325 E Allen St #2! Located on the first floor, so carrying groceries and bags is a breeze. This 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath, the tri-level condo is available for rent in Fishtown. Enter into the unit to find an expansive open first floor with top-of-the-line amenities, modern kitchen with Carrera style counter tops, stand-alone island with ample seating, and stainless-steel appliances. Floor to ceiling windows in the living and dining room allow for an extra sun-soaked space. Through the sliding glass doors, you'll find an EXTRA-LARGE outdoor space that is RARE in the city and perfect for grilling, entertaining, and pets. Head downstairs to find a laundry room that houses mechanicals and side by side washer and dryer. Continue down the hallway to find your first generously sized bedroom with ample closet space and a three-piece ensuite accented in white subway tile.
